root.name: Super Mini Puzzle Heroes
root.description: Super Mini Puzzle Heroes is similar to the Puyo Puyo series as well as Super Puzzle Fighter II Turbo. It features a menage of stars of Nickelodeon-broadcast shows at the time of the game's release, including the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - their first crossover with Nick characters - more than a month before their series airs.Playable CharactersDonatelloTimmyRed RangerPoLeonardoSpongebobGirBloomDanny PhantomJennyKorraPatrick (unlockable)MichelangeloRaphaelHiro (unlockable)Fanboy Chum-Chum (unlockable)Dark Bloom (unlockable)Jimmy (unlockable)Pink Ranger (unlockable)Private (unlockable)Dudley (unlockable)Aang (unlockable)Splinter (unlockable)
